_aChangeLog.text: 5 new obstacles for you to beat

_sText:
Do not watch the video if you don't wish to spoil the map! Refer to it as a helper if you are stuck.

  • Important thing 1: Addressing my previous experience with some people: THIS MAP IS NOT INTENDED FOR SPEEDRUNNING, IT IS NOT A BHOP_ MAP, CORRECT ZONE PLACEMENT IS NOT HAVING ZONES AT ALL (unless you just want to record your time playing or something, can't stop you!)
  • Important thing 2: Obstacle 19 involving a ladder is impossible to beat in Momentum due to them using CS:GO ladder code, which is different. AFAIK, other 19 obstacles should be possible, IF you disable antiheadbug, antiedgebug and other quirks.

This map tests your knowledge of Source engine with 20 small obstacles ranging from common knowledge to niche. Each obstacle must be completed by one person at a time (it probably won't break with multiple players but better safe than sorry). Sometimes bugs are the intended solution. Can you beat them all?

Server requirements: 100 tick, no stamina (autobhop settings), DISABLE RNGFIX OR SURFFIX PLUGINS!

Download the _v2 version, i kept the original for archival purposes.
